fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Mark a player each night.
(You must mark on night 1)
You have a 85% chance of marking yourself. On the next night, if you have marked yourself, you die. If you have marked another player, learn their faction.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Learn another players faction, and if they are evil get them voted out. (Otherwise, Town Goal)
